name: Saltair Serum Deodorant Signature Scents 2 Pack. 5% AHA Formula. Lactic Acid and Mandelic Acid Deodorant. Aluminum Free Odor Control for Women and Men. Travel Essentials, 2x 1.7oz Roll On
short_description: LONG-LASTING ODOR PROTECTION: Clinically proven for up to 48-hour odor control, Saltair Serum Deodorant combines AHA’s with Xylitol, creating an environment where odors can’t thrive.
BYE-BYE BUMPS: AHA’s like Mandelic acid and Lactic acid help exfoliate and smooth, and combined with PHA (polyhydroxys) and niacinamide help support the look of clear, even skin tone.
NO WHITE MARKS: Lightweight serum glides on effortlessly without residue. This non-sticky formula dries effectively without staining clothes. Suitable for sensitive skin.
SIGNATURE SCENTS: Featuring Pink Beach with Coconut, Almond Blossom & Vanilla notes plus Santal Bloom with Creamy Sandalwood, Sheer Amber & Sensual Musk notes.
GOOD FOR SKIN: Cruelty-free, gluten-free, vegan, and paraben-free. Everything we create is made with a body-positive vibe. Saltair - Body Care is Skin Care. Every Body is Welcome Here

product_description: Stay fresh all day with Harry's Deodorant for men, a hardworking stick dedicated to your pits. This aluminum-free formula offers up to 48 hours of powerful odor protection, keeping odor at bay, all day. The subtle, elevated Redwood scent combines notes of evergreen and thyme. Formulated with ginger root, this aluminum-free deodorant helps soothe and protect sensitive underarm skin. The smooth, non-sticky formula glides on effortlessly, leaving you feeling comfortable. Made without BHT, D5, or parabens, it's the ideal addition to any man's grooming routine.

name: Secret Aluminum Free Deodorant for Women, 48hr Odor Protection, Naturally Derived Ingredients, Free of Parabens Dyes Talc & Baking Soda, PH Balanced, Dry Solid, Coconut Scent, 2.4 oz (Pack Of 3)
short_description: FREE OF ALUMINUM SALTS, PARABENS, DYES, & TALC - Allowing you to stay fresh without compromising on ingredients.

NO WHITE MARKS - Its designed to leave no white marks or residue, ensuring a clean application every time. This means you can confidently wear your favorite clothes without worrying about marks from your deodorant.
TROPICAL COCONUT SCENT - The delightful coconut fragrance in this deodorant will transport you to a tropical paradise while keeping you smelling great
TOUGH ON ODOR, CLEAR ON SKIN - Secret's aluminum-free formula is tough on odor while remaining clear on the skin. This option provides effective odor protection that is aluminum free.

24/7 ODOR PROTECTION* - Provides odor protection around the clock. *When used daily, this antiperspirant deodorant helps maintain a clean, confident feel, allowing you to tackle whatever your day brings.
pH BALANCING MINERALS – Secret Aluminum Free Clear Solid is made with pH balancing minerals
product_description: Experience all-day freshness with Secret Aluminum Free Deodorant for Women, specially formulated to provide 48 hours of reliable odor protection without the use of aluminum. This gentle deodorant is free of harsh additives such as parabens, dyes, talc, and baking soda, making it perfect for sensitive skin. Infused with a soothing lavender scent, this deodorant not only keeps you smelling great but also ensures your skin feels comfortable throughout the day. The easy application glides on smoothly, providing effective odor control while allowing your skin to breathe. Embrace the confidence of clean, fresh skin with Secret Aluminum Free Deodorant. Made from naturally derived ingredients. *any ingredient whose starting material originates from plants, minerals, microbes or animals that may be adapted to provide performance.

name: Dove Deodorant Stick for 72 Hour Odor Protection Coconut & Pink Jasmine Aluminum Free 2.4 oz
short_description: NEW PRODUCT LAUNCH - LONG-LASTING FRESHNESS: Dove Aluminum Free Deodorant Stick offers 72-hour odor protection and lasting freshness to keep you feeling confident all day
KIND TO SKIN: With a gentle-to-skin formula and superior skincare benefits, this deodorant is designed to care for your underarms
MADE WITH CARE: Free from aluminum, parabens, baking soda, and dyes, this deodorant is thoughtfully formulated to be gentle on skin and suitable for daily use
FRESH SCENT THAT LASTS: Infused with creamy coconut and pink jasmine, this deodorant delivers a delicate floral fragrance with notes of creamy coconut and jasmine petals
SOFT, COMFORTABLE UNDERARMS: Made with prebiotic glycerin and hydrating ingredients leaving underarms feeling soft, smooth, and cared for
product_description: Meet Dove’s freshest deodorant yet, without aluminum. Designed for long-lasting freshness and gentle underarm care, this deodorant delivers 72 hours of odor protection with a smooth-glide formula that leaves no visible residue. It’s the perfect way to start your day feeling confident, comfortable, and fresh. With nourishing ingredients and prebiotic glycerin, it helps maintain soft, smooth underarms while being kind to your skin. Free from aluminum, parabens, baking soda, and dyes, this formula is gentle enough for daily use and approved by PETA as vegan. The scent is a tropical escape in every swipe - creamy coconut blended with delicate pink jasmine petals, rounded out with notes of mandarin and sandalwood. It’s a fragrance that adds a touch of indulgence to your routine and keeps you feeling fresh all day. Dove Aluminum Free Deodorant Stick Coconut and Pink Jasmine is your go-to for odor protection, freshness and skin-loving care.

name: Old Spice Aluminum Free Deodorant for Men, 24/7 Lasting Freshness & Long Lasting Scent, 24/7 Sweat & Odor Protection, Fiji with Palm Tree + Coconut Scent, 3.0 oz
short_description: 24/7 ODOR PROTECTION with daily application/use
ALUMINUM FREE
Helps ELIMINATE Odors Instead of Just Masking
Ridiculously Long Lasting Scents
The freshness of the scent of a trip to Fiji with Palm Tree without the baggage handling fees.
product_description: The Old Spice Fresher collection of scents is all about discovering the freshness of nature but after you've trekked to the most remote places on earth and you've made it home you'll discover that the freshness was inside of you the whole time because you're already great, you just smell like a stinky human sometimes but that's okay. Fiji with Palm Tree smells like a place where you don't need to wear pants or shoes or say hello to coworkers you don't like at the coffee machine. It has coconut and lavender scents too. Old Spice Men's Deodorant destroys underarm odor for 24 hours without aluminum. So bring the scent of your adventures home or smell like the adventures you haven't ventured yet. We won't judge. Just do you, guy.
